resources.string: Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz, Edward Norton, Albert Finney, Joan Allen

When a British reporter was writing an expose about Black Ops operations Treadstone and Black Briar, and the ones responsible for them are concerned. And when Jason Bourne, former Treadstone operative got the file on Treadstone and Black Briar and gave it to Pamela Landy who then passed it to the media. When the men behind Treadstone and Black Briar learn of this, they are concerned how this will affect other ops they have.
